attributes.action: Ensure delivery drivers have access to hand washing facilities
attributes.background: Ensure and enforce that delivery drivers have the correct access to hand washing facilities in the midst of the coronavirus outbreak. They are the people who enable self isolation to be feasible and yet without the correct measures of hygiene available they will render it completely pointless

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301482
